description: This Dashboard provides a general overview of a host, with templating to select the datasource and hostname.

targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "uptime_value" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT last(value) FROM "users_value" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT last(value) FROM "load_midterm" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT last(value) FROM "memory_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'free' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "load_longterm" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") *-1+100 FROM "cpu_value" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "type" = 'percent' AND "type_instance" = 'idle') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance" fill(null)
select derivative(mean(value),1s) AS idle from "cpu_value" WHERE "type" = 'cpu' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), instance, type_instance fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "memory_value" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "type_instance" = 'used' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
select mean(value) from "processes_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'running' AND "type" = 'ps_state' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
select mean(value) from "processes_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'blocked' AND "type" = 'ps_state' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
select mean(value) from "processes_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'sleeping' AND "type" = 'ps_state' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
select mean(value) from "processes_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'stopped' AND "type" = 'ps_state' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
select mean(value) from "processes_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'paging' AND "type" = 'ps_state' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
select mean(value) from "processes_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'zombies' AND "type" = 'ps_state' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean(value), 1s)*8 FROM "interface_rx" WHERE "type"='if_octets' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), instance fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean(value), 1s)*8 FROM "interface_tx" WHERE "type"='if_octets' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), instance fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean(value), 1s) FROM "disk_read" WHERE "type" = 'disk_octets' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "instance" fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean(value), 1s) FROM "disk_write" WHERE "type" = 'disk_octets' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "instance" fill(null)
select derivative(mean(value),1s) from "swap_value" WHERE "type" = 'swap_io' AND "type_instance" = 'in' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
select derivative(mean(value),1s) from "swap_value" WHERE "type" = 'swap_io' AND "type_instance" = 'out' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

title: collectd - system metrics
